DOC.brief_summary: This prospective case series study ; morbidly obese patient need surgical management Royal Alexandra Hospital provide 3 surgical option : Laparoscopic Sleeve Gastrectomy ( LSG ) , laparoscopic Roux-en-Y gastric bypass ( LR-en-Y ) , laparoscopic gastric banding ( LGB ) , safety effectiveness compare among 3 group . The outcome measure percentage excess weight loss , BMI , operative time , hospital stay , complication improvement comorbidities .
DOC.criteria: morbid obese patient age 1865 , BMI > 40 kg/m2 BMI > 35 kg/m2 severe comorbidities : diabetes , sleep apnea , hypertension etc . psychiatric illness , substance abuse , previous gastrointestinal surgery , patient transfer laparoscopic convention procedure .
